about_the_game:
You have 10 seconds!

In Time Warp Infinite, every round only lasts 10 seconds! Run to the stage goal, jump on your opponent to kick ‘em off-screen, and be the only one to stand under the Temple when the timer ends! Then, you will be teleported instantly to another twisted, hazardous stage !

Time Warp Infinite is a wild, platforming couch party game, for 1 to 4 players. One-button gameplay ensures all your friends can enjoy playing straight away! Experienced players will be rewarded with extensive mechanics, a vast selection of 300+ stages and our beloved CHAOS mode, adding hilarious modifiers to turn the tables!

Infinite speedrunning

No friends at home today ? Hone your platforming skills in single-player modes. Arcade mode features a selection of randomly-chosen stages, with leaderboards and 5 difficulty settings to unlock. Collect gears to improve your character’s abilities roguelike-style, and try to clear 6, 10, 16 or even ∞ stages before the timer runs out!

Campaign mode will take you on a speed-running journey to save Ticky and their friends from time-bending chaos! Clear stages and play with new characters and modifiers to unlock new paths in the world map.

The bullet-point features list you’ve been waiting for

  • Local couch free-for all or team multiplayer for 2-4 players
  • Can be picked up instantly by any casual or hardcore gamer
  • 300+ original stages filled with obstacles… that you can use to your advantage!
  • Many, many modifiers to unlock : Turbo mode? Infinite double-jumps? Wrap around the screen? Overpowered attacks? Identical-looking players? Or maybe, have all of this at once? You can!
  • Our exhilarating CHAOS mode will spice up every round with random twists!
  • Score attack mode for 1 player, with upgrades to unlock in every run and tight speedrunning.
  • Campaign mode to master game mechanics and unlock new characters.
  • Stylish, colorful psychedelic yet crystal-clear pixel art visuals.
  • Catchy, upbeat 10-second music tunes.
  • Accessibility options and assist modes to customize the game to your needs.

About the developer

Based in Lyon, France, Charly Piva aka Zoglu is an indie solo developer, with projects ranging from educational serious math/programming games and apps, to countless jam games, some of them being released as full-fledged experiences like Powercut, Inc., RUNRUNRUN and Time Warp Infinite!
Emphasizing on simplicity and refined core mechanics, with colorful, catchy visuals and music, these games are always easy to pick up and filled with creativity.

name: Time Warp Infinite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Time Warp Infinite is a wild platforming couch party game for 1 to 4 players! Run and jump to kick your opponents off-screen in chaotic 10-second rounds, featuring a vast choice of stages and modifiers, or beat the clock in a huge single-player speedrunning campaign!
